title: Bookmarks bar disappearing apparently still an issue after 12 years.
content:
I searched the forums, and it appears this issue has answers going back 12 years.

Answers explain how to get it to show up again. Basically, it amounts to turning the bar off and back on again.

The problem is it WILL happen again. Why? It's been 12 years and no explanation as to why it happens or how to fix it permanently.

None of the Firefox updates over the years have addressed this either.
creator: dexluther

title: 打开新标签页的时候提示“哎呀，载入内容时发生错误”
content: 干啥都行，能搞定这个问题就行。
creator: jlu_sundeli

title: Screen recorder
content:
I'm looking for a screen recorder. The addon search list has several.

Awesome screenshot has a lot of users, but some aren't thrilled that you have to create an account.

it doesn't have to be particularly fancy. For instance, I have a couple Firefox and Windows issues I'd like t document.
creator: noel_envoide
